name: Receipt-Right
description: A Receipt storage and organization application to provide a modern approach for showing up organized and prepared for your tax account by utilizing technology to help users track and organize deductible expenses, put users money back in users pockets and create a seamless process.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Stephanie Perroni
